author: Ashley Schumacher
title: Halcyon Financial Technology Honored as Best for Financial Services Compliance Technology 2015 by 'Wealth & Finance International'
text:
Bolstering the company’s international recognition for its premier technology services for financial firms, Halcyon Financial Technology, L.P. (HalcyonFT) was recently awarded “Best for Financial Services Compliance Technology” by “Wealth & Finance International.” The publication’s 2015 Wealth & Money Management awards recognize companies and individuals dedicated to achieving stellar results for clients. Based in San Francisco, HalcyonFT provides technology to clients with an aggregate AUM of more than $90 billion, delivering customized outsourced IT solutions as well as consulting, infrastructure and application services. The 2015 “Wealth & Finance” Wealth and Money Management awards are “dedicated to uncovering and promoting the work and achievements of the very best the financial services community has to offer.” Earlier this year, HalcyonFT was named “Best Investment Industry IT Provider” in the “Wealth & Finance” Alternative Investment Awards. Likewise, the company was named “Investment Industry IT Provider of the Year” by Corporate LiveWire’s Global Funds 2015.
“When it comes to compliance technology, our financial services clients require superior security and compliance technologies and processes that enable compliance with the latest SEC and FINRA regulatory requirements. HalcyonFT provides a Cyber security and compliance technology gap analysis that identifies how a firm can improve its security and compliance infrastructure, and implement polices and best practice procedures. We are thrilled to be recognized by ‘Wealth & Finance’ for our robust, innovative compliance technology services,” said HalcyonFT Managing Partner Rodric O’Connor.
HalcyonFT works with small to mid-size financial services firms in major U.S. metropolitan areas with offices in San Francisco, New York and Newport Beach. Services include industry leading IT support, helping clients leverage cloud-based services to enhance employee productivity and improve collaboration, and implementing converged compute, storage and security infrastructure. HalcyonFT connects with both new and established businesses to provide seamless service, infrastructure and applications, which provide reliability, security and regulatory compliance.
Winners, which are selected based on in-house research and votes from respected industry partners, and more details in the Wealth & Money Management category, are available on the “Wealth & Finance” website: http://www.wealthandfinance-intl.com/wealth-and-money-management-awards .
About Halcyon Financial Technology
Formed in 2010 by industry veteran Rodric O’Connor to address a gap in serving small to mid-size financial services firms with industry-leading IT support, HalcyonFT’s team of experienced IT professionals brings decades of experience in the financial services industry. HalcyonFT exclusively serves financial services firms with a full understanding of industry trends, challenges and expectations. For more information, please visit http://www.halcyonft.com .
